name: Fractured TV Shows Quiz | Fractured TV | 10 Questions

questions.correct: I dream of Jeannie & I dream of genie & I dream of Jeanie
questions.explanation: I dream of Jeannie & I dream of genie & I dream of Jeanie.

The Brady Bunch.

	Can you remember all of the kids' names?

Friends.

	Do you think this should be their last season? Who do you think will end up with whom?

ER.

	My favorite show, but should this be the last season?

Petticoat Junction.

	'...and that's Uncle Joe, he's a-movin' kinda slow at the Junction. Petticooooat JUNCTION! Whoo, whoo!'

questions.correct: The Man from Uncle & The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
questions.explanation:
The Man from Uncle & The Man from U.N.C.L.E.

	I used to have crushes on those two guys, David McCallum and Robert Vaughan.

Gilligan's Island.

	'Just sit right back and hear a tale, a tale of a fateful ship....'

Providence.

	My friend Rob Fresco is a writer for this fine show.

Seinfeld.

	I miss it, but there's plenty o' reruns around.

I Love Lucy.

	'Lucy, you got some splaining to do!'
